objects.name: Analytic 1055
objects.description: Track creation or update of SaaS automation scripts (e.g., Google Workspace Apps Script). Detect when these scripts are bound to user events such as file opens or account modifications, and correlate with subsequent abnormal API calls that exfiltrate or modify user data.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: saas:appsscript
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Create / Update: Deployment of scripts with event-driven triggers

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: saas:googledrive
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: FileOpen / FileAccess: Event-driven script triggering on user file actions

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Which SaaS apps or APIs can be legitimately automated in the environment
Event-driven triggers (e.g., on file open, on user creation) considered suspicious
